entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blue River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blue River Airport 12:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
